column5: Over the past 6 weeks or so I've been doing some work to 580sq/ft of my basement, I removed an old ceiling , installed T&G pine and pot lights , bought some Man Cave decor and some antiques and folky stuff..  I have some work left to do like, new carpet and some tiles, a new bar top , paint and trim and build a lit top for the fish tank, re organize my mounts and get a few more... but it's very useable as is.  Check it out .  <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/VpRTxqJNssg" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>    Randy (Cave Man) from Sturgeon.
Nice place to get away! Love the Jiggers, want to get a couple myself!
awesome
Hey, your all set up!  Did you remove the firing pin from that shotgun?
I like it Randy!  Every man needs a man cave of some sort.
Good job Randy all's you need is the "he man wimmin haters club" sign from the little Rascals.   Art
Nice job randy
Thats a man cave for you.  Just missing some Toronto Maple Leaf stuff.lol
Sweet. What kind of beer do you have on tap? haha
Awesome little hangout there, Randy!  When's the swill happenin?

Thanks Guys!!!  I priced out a tap system, WOW! just the set up is 350$ plus a CO2 account ( Beer Store doesn't handle this anymore )and a Keg is 8 cases and only good for about 30 days, for me It's not worth the cash, It would be if I didn't have to work in the mornings  Nick, It's a Pellet Gun
i love it ,,,,my wife hates it

My wife has no choice but to " like " it houses over 300 of her books , I still need to build her a proper book case. I don't mind her having her literature down here , it adds to the appeal, until you read the titles .. She always comes home with " Man Cave " stuff ... I still have a lot of stuff to display . ...

Thats pretty awsome Randy  , talking about hooking up 02 in your cave reminded me of when i hooked up the drink in mine , if i remember right it cost me 125 bucks to hook up h02 out in my man cave and i've never regretted do it , its so handy ........ lol , i know its not the real strong suff but heres a pic of some of the things we're able to do out there once we turn the tap on ........ lol . "Skeeter and i " last weekend after doing a tune up on his sled
Now that is cool !  Next year , I'll have one of those ...
Randy- Better than most basements on MTV Cribs-do you have any fish stories about your mounted fish? Tim
Very tacky... Wayyyy too much stuff crammed down there...  I love it!!!! Lol  Just missing a recliner with a view of the TV!!!   Then again, if that was there you'd never leave!!  Awesome Randy!
I watched the video twice and could not see the first-aid station anywhere! You're living on the edge there Randy! HH
Captain Cave Ran!!!
Great Job Bud!!
Lookin good randy !!!!! Cheers
